pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br)Health: 20

Summoned by using the $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#mighty_brothers_xx_gashat)Mighty Brothers XX$(/l) or $(l:ex_aid/items/rider_gashats#knock_out_fighter_2_gashat)Knock Out Fighter 2 Gashat$(/l)$(br2)Disappears when any other Gashat is used$(br2)Follows the player and aids in combat
